description: The VISIT_SET_HX_CHANGE table contains details of what items were modified in a revision of a visit set. Information about the user modifying the visit set and the time of modification can be found in VISIT_SET_HX_REVISION.

columns.name: VISIT_SET_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the visit set record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AUDIT_TRAIL_REVISION
columns.description: The revision in which this update was made. Corresponds with a line of VISIT_SET_HX_REVISION.

columns.name: AUDIT_TRAIL_ITEM
columns.description: The number of the item that was updated

columns.name: AUDIT_TRAIL_LINE
columns.description: The line of the item in AUDIT_TRAIL_ITEM being updated. 1 for single response items.

columns.name: AUDIT_TRAIL_NEW_VALUE
columns.description: The new value of the item in AUDIT_TRAIL_ITEM at the line in AUDIT_TRAIL_LINE, after the update is made.
